code: import React from'react';import AddIconSvg from"../assets/add.svg";import ImageIconSvg from"../assets/image.svg";import PdfIconSvg from"../assets/pdf.svg";import ExcelIconSvg from"../assets/excel.svg";import WordIconSvg from"../assets/word.svg";import CsvIconSvg from"../assets/csv.svg";import TextIconSvg from"../assets/text.svg";import RarIconSvg from"../assets/rar.svg";import ZipIconSvg from"../assets/zip.svg";import CancelIconSvg from"../assets/cancel.svg";export var Icono={get:function get(formato,w,h){var ICO='';switch(formato){case"add":ICO=React.createElement("img",{className:'v-center',src:AddIconSvg,alt:"add",width:w,height:h,style:{opacity:0.7}});break;case"jpeg":ICO=React.createElement("img",{className:'v-center',src:ImageIconSvg,alt:"jpeg",width:w,height:h});break;case"png":ICO=React.createElement("img",{className:'v-center',src:ImageIconSvg,alt:"png",width:w,height:h});break;case"pdf":ICO=React.createElement("img",{className:'v-center',src:PdfIconSvg,alt:"pdf",width:w,height:h});break;case"xlsx":ICO=React.createElement("img",{className:'v-center',src:ExcelIconSvg,alt:"xlsx",width:w,height:h});break;case"csv":ICO=React.createElement("img",{className:'v-center',src:CsvIconSvg,alt:"xlsx",width:w,height:h});break;case"docx":ICO=React.createElement("img",{className:'v-center',src:WordIconSvg,alt:"docx",width:w,height:h});break;case"txt":ICO=React.createElement("img",{className:'v-center',src:TextIconSvg,alt:"txt",width:w,height:h});break;case"rar":ICO=React.createElement("img",{className:'v-center',src:RarIconSvg,alt:"rar",width:w,height:h});break;case"zip":ICO=React.createElement("img",{className:'v-center',src:ZipIconSvg,alt:"zip",width:w,height:h});break;default:ICO=React.createElement("img",{className:'v-center',src:CancelIconSvg,alt:"",width:w,height:h});}return ICO;}};
